content.heading: Bring life to your space with plants1
content.subheading:
Learn how to care for your indoor plants with our expert guides and simple tips.1
yes

content.heading: About Verdant1
paragraphs: We believe that everyone deserves to enjoy the beauty and benefits of plants, regardless of experience level.1
Our mission is to make plant care accessible, enjoyable, and rewarding.2
Founded by a team of horticulture experts and plant enthusiasts, Verdant provides scientifically-based care advice while keeping things simple enough for beginners.3

content.heading: Essential Care Guides1
content.subheading: Everything you need to know to keep your plants thriving2

guides.title: Watering12
guides.description: Learn the art of proper watering - when, how much, and how often for different types of plants.1

guides.title: Light Requirements12
guides.description: Discover how to place your plants to give them the perfect amount of sunlight they need.1

guides.title: Soil & Fertilizers12
guides.description: Understanding the right soil and nutrients that will help your plants flourish all year long.1

content.heading: Expert Tips & Tricks1
content.subheading: Simple solutions to common plant problems1

tips.title: Rotate Your Plants Regularly1
tips.description: Plants grow toward light sources, so rotate them a quarter turn weekly to keep them growing evenly and balanced.1

tips.title: Use Room Temperature Water1
tips.description: Cold water can shock plant roots. Always use room temperature water for a happier, healthier plant.1

tips.title: Clean Those Leaves1
tips.description: Dusty leaves can block sunlight and prevent proper photosynthesis. Wipe them gently with a damp cloth monthly.1

tips.title: Group Plants Together1
tips.description: Plants grouped together create a microclimate with higher humidity, which benefits most houseplants.1

content.heading: Join Our Plant Community1
content.description: Sign up for our newsletter to receive seasonal care tips, exclusive guides, and plant inspiration.1

content.heading: What Our Community Says1
content.subheading: Hear from plant lovers who've transformed their spaces1

testimonials.name: Sarah J.1
testimonials.quote: The watering guide completely changed how I care for my plants. My fiddle leaf fig that was struggling is now thriving with new leaves!1

testimonials.name: Michael T.1
testimonials.quote: As a beginner, I was killing every plant I brought home. The simple tips on this site helped me create a thriving indoor jungle in just months.1

testimonials.name: Elena R.1
testimonials.quote: I've transformed our office with plants thanks to the lighting recommendations. Everyone comments on how much more peaceful and productive the space feels now.1
